tests.name: Test 13: Global Indigenous Knowledge Systems Digital Archive and Cultural Revitalization
tests.description: Design comprehensive system integrating all domains for indigenous knowledge preservation and revitalization
tests.prompt:
Design a comprehensive global system for preserving, sharing, and revitalizing indigenous knowledge systems while respecting cultural protocols and intellectual property rights. This requires expert integration of:

KNOWLEDGE SYSTEMS: Traditional ecological knowledge, indigenous sciences, cultural mathematics, historical systems, material culture, ceremonial knowledge

LINGUISTIC INTEGRATION: Multilingual interfaces, endangered language preservation, traditional oral forms, cultural translation protocols, code-switching support

SOCIAL FRAMEWORKS: Indigenous governance integration, cultural protocol compliance, community consent mechanisms, intergenerational transmission, cultural appropriation prevention

CREATIVE EXPRESSION: Traditional art forms digitization, storytelling preservation, performance documentation, creative cultural interpretation, collaborative creation platforms

REASONING SYSTEMS: Indigenous logic systems integration, traditional reasoning validation, cross-cultural synthesis methods, ethical decision frameworks, cultural knowledge verification

Develop comprehensive indigenous knowledge preservation and revitalization system:
